definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: This increase of steel price in China has been mainly caused by the exceeding domestic steel consumption.
sentences.chinese: 钢材涨价主要是国内钢材超前消费所致。

sentences.english: Overconsuming has been in vogue nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 超前消费已成为当今的时髦。

sentences.english: And the minus interest rate further induces overstep consumption.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀下的负利率又进一步诱发了超前消费。

definition: lit. moonlight group/fig. those who spend their monthly income even before they earn their next salary (slang)
Ant Check Later, consumer credit service offered by Ant Financial Services 螞蟻金服|蚂蚁金服[Ma3 yi3 Jin1 fu2]
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
a slave to one's credit card/sb who is unable to repay their credit card borrowings
extravagant (idiom); to throw away money by the handful/wasteful
lit. eating away next year's food in advance/fig. to dip into the next month's check/live now, pay later
to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
